import React, { Component } from 'react'; import loadjs from 'loadjs' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import MyCart from '../components/MyCart' import {connect} from 'unistore/react' import {actions} from '../store'; import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class Cart extends Component { componentDidMount = async () => { this.props.getCart() } transaction = () => { this.props.addTransaction() this.props.history.push("/transaction") } componentWillMount() { loadjs(["js/jquery.min.js", "../js/popper.min.js", "../js/bootsrap.min.js", "../js/jquery.easing.1.3.js", "../js/jquery.waypoints.min.js", "../js/jquery.flexslider-min.js", "../js/owl.carousel.min.js", "../js/jquery.magnific-popup.min.js", "../js/magnific-popup-options.js", "../js/bootstrap-datepicker.js", "../js/jquery.stellar.min.js", "../js/main.js", ], function() { }); } render() { const {cart, total_price} = this.props; return (
Product Details
Price
Quantity
Total
Remove
{cart.map((item, key) => { return ( ) })}

Subtotal: Rp.{total_price}

Delivery: Rp.0

Total: Rp.{total_price}

); } } export default connect( "cart, total_price", actions )(withRouter(Cart));
